reviews.review: redomendo, não tenho nada a dizer

O jogo é muito divertido e engraçado se jogado com os amigos em call, mas também pode ser bem desafiador e tenso jogado sozinho (ou até mesmo com os amigos, caso queiram uma gameplay mais séria). 

Saber combinar habilidades, tanto dos assassinos quanto dos sobreviventes, deixa cada partida diferente e mais inesperada que a anterior, podendo levar aos jogadores momentos de muita gargalhada ou angústia.

1 katil ve 4 kurbandan oluşan gerilim dolu oyun amacınız haritada bulunan 7 jeneratörden 5 tanesini tamir etmek ve kapıyı açıp kaçmak tek başınıza oynadığınızda oyunun atmosferinin daha çok içine giriyorsunuz ama arkadaşlarla oynamak çok daha keyifli isterseniz 5 kişi girip özel oyunda katil olup arkadaşlarınızı katledebilirsiniz.

O jogo em si é muito bom, a temática desenvolvida em cima dele, porém de algumas atualizações pra cá, o jogo tem tido mais bug's do que o comum... Palet's que fazem o killer atravessar pro seu lado te impedindo de pula-la. Hit's de longa distância sem sentido algum, lag's e bugs pelo mapa. Porém é um bom jogo, da pra se divertir, jogando 4, 5 partidas, passando disso, só stress.
Muito bom e divertido otima com os amigos
I love this game and although it is incredibly laggy and the graphics are meh at first, you can fix them and after a few tweaks the game runs really fast and is incredibly fun to play 10/10

I thoroughly enjoy this game. Dead by Daylight is a horror game where you play as either one of four "survivors" or as a "killer". The goal of the game as he survivors is to repair five of the generators that are randomly scattered around the map, which power the two exits. The goal of the killer is to find the survivors and sacrifice them or kill them. During each round, you earn blood points, which let you unlock perks and objects from the "Blood Web" that you can use in the game, but if you don't escape, hen you can lose some of these objects. The game has a lot of unique content, and I really find it enjoyable, and I think that anyone who doesn't mind violence and enjoys horror games will feel the same way

When playing as a survivor I'm only grouped up with other people who are brand new to the game and don't know how to play versus a veteran killer. When playing as a killer the game matches me up only with veteran players who make it very clear they're all on voice comms as the match progresses, and worse yet, people who 'glitch' the game mechanics to prevent you as a killer from doing anything (i.e. wait until the killer (you) gets close, then run around you so when you swing you have a very high chance of missing the attack).

Basically, the matchmaking makes it so a solo player always loses. And since none of my friends own this game (and at this point I'm telling my friends very decisively not to buy this garbage), I must be on the losing side.

I have no problem with a game being made better for people on voice comms, but to make it the sole activity of these groups to farm people who aren't, makes a really terrible game.

I'm at 116 minutes, asking for refund. Screw this.

ゲームバランスがあまりにも偏りすぎているうえ、民度も低くやっててイライラするゲームです。
ランク格差もありすぎでランク１０のキラーでもランク１のサバイバー４人を相手させられます。
散々煽りまくられて暴言を吐かれ頑張って２人処刑しても結局自分はランク下げられ、BPももらえません。
キラー側は能力、パーク、アドオンを下方修正するばかりでこの先キラーがいなくなるのは目に見えています。
ここまで酷いゲームは見たことないですね。
まあ友人を誘って人を煽りたい悪趣味な人達にはお勧めのゲームです。
